      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void connectInputAdapter()

      void disconnectInputAdapter()

      StreamDetails getStreamDetails() 
      void handleDelivery(java.lang.String consumerTag, com.rabbitmq.client.Envelope envelope, com.rabbitmq.client.AMQP.BasicProperties properties, byte[] body)
      Auto generated method that handles the incoming messages from the data bus for a specific stream The message is in RDF format, that's why we need to deserialize the RDF with the method deserializeRDF that returns a HashMap that links the name of the field of the stream and it's data type

    • Method Detail

      • connectInputAdapter

        public void connectInputAdapter()
        Method used to add a new stream to Esper. First param is the name of the Stream(routing key of the stream with the . replaced with a _ ) and the second is the definition of the fields(HashMap with key - name of field and value - data type) Also we connect to a message bus to listen for messages coming for that specific sensor.

      • handleDelivery

        public void handleDelivery(java.lang.String consumerTag,
                           com.rabbitmq.client.Envelope envelope,
                           com.rabbitmq.client.AMQP.BasicProperties properties,
                           byte[] body)
        Auto generated method that handles the incoming messages from the data bus for a specific stream The message is in RDF format, that's why we need to deserialize the RDF with the method deserializeRDF that returns a HashMap that links the name of the field of the stream and it's data type
        Specified by:
        handleDelivery in interface com.rabbitmq.client.Consumer
        Overrides:
        handleDelivery in class com.rabbitmq.client.DefaultConsumer

      • disconnectInputAdapter

        public void disconnectInputAdapter()
        Method used to disconnect a stream from the message bus and also Esper

        public StreamDetails getStreamDetails()
